item.name: Device Uptime
item.description: The time since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:sysUpTime.nodata(300)}=1
trigger.name: Not getting SNMP updates from {HOSTNAME}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.1.last(0)}=2 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.1.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 1 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.1.last(0)}=1 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.1.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 1 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered on

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.1.last(0)}=4
trigger.name: Port 1 on {HOSTNAME} is in error state
trigger.description: The power outlet is faulty, please investigate.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.2.last(0)}=2 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.2.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 2 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.2.last(0)}=1 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.2.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 2 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered on

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.2.last(0)}=4
trigger.name: Port 2 on {HOSTNAME} is in error state
trigger.description: The power outlet is faulty, please investigate.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.3.last(0)}=2 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.3.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 3 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.3.last(0)}=1 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.3.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 3 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered on

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.3.last(0)}=4
trigger.name: Port 3 on {HOSTNAME} is in error state
trigger.description: The power outlet is faulty, please investigate.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.4.last(0)}=2 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.4.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 4 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.4.last(0)}=1 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.4.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 4 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered on

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.4.last(0)}=4
trigger.name: Port 4 on {HOSTNAME} is in error state
trigger.description: The power outlet is faulty, please investigate.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.5.last(0)}=2 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.5.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 5 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.5.last(0)}=1 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.5.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 5 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered on

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.5.last(0)}=4
trigger.name: Port 5 on {HOSTNAME} is in error state
trigger.description: The power outlet is faulty, please investigate.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.6.last(0)}=2 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.6.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 6 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.6.last(0)}=1 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.6.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 6 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered on

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.6.last(0)}=4
trigger.name: Port 6 on {HOSTNAME} is in error state
trigger.description: The power outlet is faulty, please investigate.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.7.last(0)}=2 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.7.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 7 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.7.last(0)}=1 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.7.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 7 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered on

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.7.last(0)}=4
trigger.name: Port 7 on {HOSTNAME} is in error state
trigger.description: The power outlet is faulty, please investigate.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.8.last(0)}=2 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.8.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 8 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.8.last(0)}=1 & {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.8.change(0)}=1
trigger.name: Port 8 on {HOSTNAME} has been powered on

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:portstatus.8.last(0)}=4
trigger.name: Port 8 on {HOSTNAME} is in error state
trigger.description: The power outlet is faulty, please investigate.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:powerUsage.last(0)}>{Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:thresholdNear.last(0)}
trigger.name: Powerusage on {HOSTNAME} is nearly overloaded

dependency.name: Power usage on {HOSTNAME} is overloaded
dependency.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:powerUsage.last(0)}>{Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:thresholdOverload.last(0)}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:powerUsage.last(0)}>{Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:thresholdOverload.last(0)}
trigger.name: Power usage on {HOSTNAME} is overloaded

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:powerUsage.last(0)}={Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:thresholdLow.last(0)}
trigger.name: Power usage on {HOSTNAME} is too low
trigger.description: The power usage has reached the Low threshold.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP APC Rack PDU:sysUpTime.last(0)}<600
trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} has just been restarted
